name: TeamCardOne
description: Team member card with image background, overlay info card at bottom-left corner.

name.note: Team member name displayed in overlay card

imageSrc.note: Image path for team member photo (displays as square with rounded-theme)

imageAlt.note: Alt text for image (defaults to member name if not provided)

propsSchema.members: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' | 'depth-3d' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <TeamCardOne members={[{ id: '1', name: 'Sophie P.', role: 'Digital Nomad', imageSrc: '/team/sophie.jpg' }]} title="Meet Our Team" description="Get to know the people behind our success" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
